venues.name: Luigi's Pizza
venues.description: Luigi's Pizza is a family owned restaurant that has been serving New York style pizza for over 20 years.

venues.name: Burger Town
venues.description: Here at Burger Town we serve the best burgers in town.

venues.name: Amy's Ice Cream
venues.description: Amy's Ice Cream is a nice place to get some ice cream.

venues.name: Geno's Steaks
venues.description: Looking for a good Philly Cheesesteak? Come to Geno's Steaks.

venues.name: Funky Noodle
venues.description: Funky Noodle is a great place to get some Asian food.

venues.name: Los Tacos No. 1
venues.description: Los Tacos No. 1 is a great place to get some tacos. They have the best tacos in town.
